flawed_nl_solution:
26/2=<<26/2=31>>31 of the purses are genuine.
24/4=<<24/4=6>>6 of the handbags are fake.
24-6=<<24-6=18>>18 of the handbags are genuine.
There are 31+18=<<31+18=49>>49 genuine purses and handbags
#### 49

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
